amendment.description: To limit the extension or establishment of national monuments in the State of Utah.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 187 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 33. Record Vote Number: 20.
Amendment SA 187 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 112. (consideration: CR S1160; text: CR S1160) To limit the extension or establishment of national monuments in the State of Utah.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 187 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 33. Record Vote Number: 20.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 187 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 112.
